articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Apple Inc readies new iPads and M3 MacBook Air to combat sales slump - Business Standard
articles.description: The Mac and iPad account for 15% of Apple's revenue combined, and they've been particularly hard hit by a decline in consumer tech spending
articles.content: Mark GurmanApple Inc, seeking to reverse a decline in Mac and iPad sales, is preparing several new models and upgrades for early next year, according to people familiar with the situation.

articles.title: Another technology milestone achieved: PM Modi on Chandrayaan-3 feat - Times of India - IndiaTimes
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi lauded a significant achievement in India's space exploration efforts as the Propulsion Module of Chandrayaan-.

articles.title: Rethinking Evolution: The Surprising Truth About Newborn Brain Development - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A UCL study reveals human newborns' brains are similarly developed to other primates at birth, with significant growth occurring post-birth, challenging previous notions about human brain development and evolution. Contrary to current understanding, the brain…

articles.title: Bridge-sized asteroid to come as close as 5.5mn km to Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: A Near-Earth Asteroid which is bigger than the Empire State Building is predicted to pass Earth closely today, December 6. Know the asteroid’s speed, distance of approach, size, and other details, as per NASA.
